welcome_message_body: Welcome to San Pedro, Philippines! Get ready to experience the charm of our vibrant city, known for its beautiful landscapes, warm hospitality, and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that San Pedro has to offer during your stay!

restaurants.name: El Parronal
restaurants.description: El Parronal is a sandwich spot located in San Pedro.
restaurants.address: San Pedro, Metropolitana de Santiago de Chile

restaurants.name: La Rosita de Panchito
restaurants.description: La Rosita de Panchito is a restaurant located in the city.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving mostly international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it serves as the main hub for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves as the hub for low-cost carriers such as Cebu Pacific and AirAsia.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a time limit of 2 hours per session.
